DocAttribute.Name: NominalDiameter
CrossSectionArea
BarLength
PredefinedType
BarSurface

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcReinforcingBarType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT EXISTS(PredefinedType) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcReinforcingBarTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcReinforcingBarTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS(SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If this occurrence is defined by a type object, the latter has to be an _IfcReinforcingBarType_.
